0.title: hypovolemia
evidence: # ___ lactate: likely secondary to hypovolemia, infection and recent drug use. lactate resolving at d/c. bun/cr normalized (___) at discharge.

accuracy.justification: the discharge summary explicitly mentions hypovolemia as a likely cause for elevated lactate, supporting the assigned code.
